thread.title: Pioneer to Host Fourth Quarter and Year End 2017 Financial Results Conference Call on Wednesday, March 28, 2018 at 4:30 p.m. ET

author: cnbc.com
title: Pioneer to Host Fourth Quarter and Year End 2017 Financial Results Conference Call on Wednesday, March 28, 2018 at 4:30 p.m. ET
text:
FORT LEE, N.J., March 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Pioneer Power Solutions, Inc . (Nasdaq: PPSI) ("Pioneer" or the "Company"), a company engaged in the manufacture, sale and service of electrical transmission, distribution and on-site power generation equipment, today announced that management will report Pioneer's 2017 fourth quarter and year end financial results after the market closes on Wednesday, March 28, 2018. Management will then host a conference call on Wednesday, March 28, 2018 at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time to discuss the results with the investment community.
Anyone interested in participating should call 1-888-882-4478 if calling within the United States or 1-323-701-0225 if calling internationally. When asked, please reference confirmation code 8903107.
A replay will be available until April 4, 2018 which can be accessed by dialing 1-844-512-2921 if calling within the United States or 1-412-317-6671 if calling internationally. Please use passcode 8903107 to access the replay.
The call will also be accompanied live by webcast over the Internet and accessible at http://public.viavid.com/index.php?id=128894 .
About Pioneer Power Solutions, Inc.
Pioneer Power Solutions, Inc. manufactures, sells and services a broad range of specialty electrical transmission, distribution and on-site power generation equipment for applications in the utility, industrial, commercial and backup power markets. The Company's principal products and services include custom-engineered electrical transformers, low and medium voltage switchgear and engine-generator sets and controls, complemented by a national field-service organization to maintain and repair power generation assets. Pioneer is headquartered in Fort Lee, New Jersey and operates from 13 additional locations in the U.S., Canada and Mexico for manufacturing, centralized distribution, engineering, sales, service and administration. To learn more about Pioneer, please visit its website at www.pioneerpowersolutions.com .
